title: Punjabi deep-fried fish
ingredients: ['1 kg fish fillets', 'For the batter', '1½ tablespoons oil', '150g chickpea flour (besan)', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '½ teaspoon garlic ginger paste', '½ teaspoon carom seeds', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon fresh coriander', '1-2 green chillies, chopped with seeds removed', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', 'Oil for deep frying', 'Pinch garam masala']
